original_text: And Hezekiah slept with his fathers, and they buried him in the upper part of the tombs of the sons of David, and all Judah and the inhabitants of Jerusalem did him honor at his death. And Manasseh his son reigned in his place.
korean_text: 히스기야가 그의 조상들과 함께 누우매 온 유다와 예루살렘 주민이 그를 다윗 자손의 묘실 중 높은 곳에 장사하여 그의 죽음에 그에게 경의를 표하였더라 그의 아들 므낫세가 대신하여 왕이 되니라

sentences.original_text: And Hezekiah slept with his fathers
in the upper part of the tombs of the sons of David
and all Judah and the inhabitants of Jerusalem
did him honor at his death
